conversation.text: If you're looking for something light and fun, 'Purple Violets' starring Patrick Wilson and Rosemarie DeWitt is a great choice. And, if you're interested in a more dramatic love story with heart, 'You Will Meet a Tall Dark Stranger' starring Anupam Kher is a must-watch.
